description:
After befriending Misao, Kenshin insists that she return the money she`s stolen before letting her accompany him on his quest to stop Shishio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eşkıya Kız: Misao Makimachi`nin Gizli Tarafı
O Verdadeiro Segredo da Misao Makimachi
Oihagi Shoujo: Makimachi Misao no Kakusareta Shoutai!
ความลับของสาวน้อยมิซาโอะ
追いはぎ少女・巻町操の隠された正体!
